short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A simple Chrome extension for taking quick notes.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Quick Notes is a simple Chrome extension for taking quick notes. With a user-friendly interface, you can create, save, and access your notes easily. You can also search, edit, and delete your notes as needed. Customize your notes with up to 1000 characters of text. Stay organized and productive with Quick Notes.
